docs.snippet: Linsanity reverberates today. We look back on it — the good, the bad and the gaffes — on the eve of Jeremy Lin's return to New York as a member of the Nets....

byline.original: By YOUSUR AL-HLOU and JOHN WOO

docs.lead_paragraph: Linsanity reverberates today. We look back on it — the good, the bad and the gaffes — on the eve of Jeremy Lin's return to New York as a member of the Nets.

headline.main: Exclusive: U.S. House to Vote on Iran Sanctions Act Renewal as Soon as November
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: U.S. House to Vote on Iran Sanctions Act Renewal as Soon as November

docs.snippet: The Republican leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives plan a vote as soon as mid-November on a 10-year reauthorization of the Iran Sanctions Act, congressional aides told Reuters on Tuesday, setting up a potential showdown with the White Hou...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives plan a vote as soon as mid-November on a 10-year reauthorization of the Iran Sanctions Act, congressional aides told Reuters on Tuesday, setting up a potential showdown with the White House and Senate.

headline.main: Slugger Schwarber Added to Cubs' World Series Roster
headline.print_headline: Slugger Schwarber Added to Cubs' World Series Roster

docs.snippet: The Chicago Cubs were given a welcome slugging boost on Tuesday when Kyle Schwarber was added to their World Series roster hours before the scheduled start of Game One versus the host Cleveland Indians....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs were given a welcome slugging boost on Tuesday when Kyle Schwarber was added to their World Series roster hours before the scheduled start of Game One versus the host Cleveland Indians.

headline.main: Senate Democrats Aim to Block LGBT Measure From Defense Bill
headline.print_headline: Senate Democrats Aim to Block LGBT Measure From Defense Bill

docs.snippet: Senate Democrats are intent on scuttling a House-passed provision that they say would undercut protections against workplace discrimination based on sexual or gender orientation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Senate Democrats are intent on scuttling a House-passed provision that they say would undercut protections against workplace discrimination based on sexual or gender orientation.

headline.main: Schaeuble-Financial Transaction Tax Possible for 10 Euro Zone Nations This Year
headline.print_headline: Schaeuble-Financial Transaction Tax Possible for 10 Euro Zone Nations This Year

docs.snippet: It is possible that 10 euro zone countries could reach a basic agreement on a financial transaction tax by the end of the year, German Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble told a group of government officials on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: It is possible that 10 euro zone countries could reach a basic agreement on a financial transaction tax by the end of the year, German Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble told a group of government officials on Tuesday.

headline.main: Schaeuble Says Monetary Policy Has Reached Its Limits
headline.print_headline: Schaeuble Says Monetary Policy Has Reached Its Limits

docs.snippet: There is a growing international consensus that monetary policy has reached the limits of its possibilities, German Finance Wolfgang Schaeuble told a group of government officials in Berlin on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: There is a growing international consensus that monetary policy has reached the limits of its possibilities, German Finance Wolfgang Schaeuble told a group of government officials in Berlin on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mormons Preach Love for LGBT Members, but No Doctrinal Shift
headline.print_headline: Mormons Preach Love for LGBT Members, but No Doctrinal Shift

docs.snippet: Mormon leaders told gay and lesbian members Tuesday that attraction to people of the same sex is not a sin or a measure of their faithfulness and may never go away, but reminded them that having sex violates fundamental doctrinal beliefs that will...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mormon leaders told gay and lesbian members Tuesday that attraction to people of the same sex is not a sin or a measure of their faithfulness and may never go away, but reminded them that having sex violates fundamental doctrinal beliefs that will not change.

headline.main: T-Mobile Seen as Top Target Following AT&T-Time Warner Deal
headline.print_headline: T-Mobile Seen as Top Target Following AT&T-Time Warner Deal

docs.snippet: T-Mobile US Inc is the likeliest acquisition target as media companies seek a wireless partner following AT&T Inc's proposed $85.4 billion takeover of Time Warner Inc, analysts said....
docs.lead_paragraph: T-Mobile US Inc is the likeliest acquisition target as media companies seek a wireless partner following AT&T Inc's proposed $85.4 billion takeover of Time Warner Inc, analysts said.

headline.main: Mercedes-Benz to Launch Pickup Truck in 2017
headline.print_headline: Mercedes-Benz to Launch Pickup Truck in 2017

docs.snippet: Mercedes-Benz said it will launch a pickup truck in late 2017, becoming the first German premium auto maker to enter one of the most lucrative segments in the car industry....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mercedes-Benz said it will launch a pickup truck in late 2017, becoming the first German premium auto maker to enter one of the most lucrative segments in the car industry.

headline.main: Draghi Says Euro Remains Vulnerable Without Banking Union
headline.print_headline: Draghi Says Euro Remains Vulnerable Without Banking Union

docs.snippet: Record-low interest rates in the euro area are not the new normal, European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said on Tuesday, adding that the single currency area will remain vulnerable without a full monetary and banking union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Record-low interest rates in the euro area are not the new normal, European Central Bank President Mario Draghi said on Tuesday, adding that the single currency area will remain vulnerable without a full monetary and banking union.
